pkgmetadata.longdescription:
MongoDB (from "humongous") is a scalable, high-performance, open source, schema-free, document-oriented database. Written in C++, MongoDB features:
MongoDB bridges the gap between key-value stores (which are fast and highly scalable) and traditional RDBMS systems (which provide structured schemas and powerful queries).

use.flag: Adds support for link time optimization
Install the MongoDB shell from app-admin/mongosh-bin
Install the MongoDB tools (mongoimport, mongodump...) from app-admin/mongo-tools
Use gold linker instead of default bfd linker.
Enable support for HTTP client requests.
Build mongod with JavaScript support. (use spidermonkey as javascript scripting engine)
Enable runtime hardening features. (e.g. stack smash protection)
